info.name: MSME Credit Scoring API
info.description:
Complete API collection for MSME credit scoring and analysis.

**Base URL:** `http://localhost:8000/api/msme/`

**Authentication:** Knox Token (Add to Authorization header)

**Sections Covered:**
- MSME Applications (CRUD + Analysis)
- Document Management
- Section-Specific Analysis

**Created:** 2026-01-15

request.description:
Login to get Knox authentication token.

Response includes token that should be used in Authorization header for all subsequent requests.
Get list of all MSME applications for authenticated user

Create new MSME application.

**MSME Categories:**
- micro
- small
- medium

Application number is auto-generated.
Get detailed information about specific application including all related sections
Delete application and all related data

Perform comprehensive MSME credit analysis.

**Analyzes All Sections:**
- A) Director/Promoter Profile (10%)
- B) Business Identity (10%)
- C) Revenue & Performance (20%)
- D) Cash Flow & Banking (25%)
- E) Credit & Repayment (22%)
- F) Compliance & Taxation (7%)
- G) Fraud & Verification (4%)
- H) External Signals (2%)
- I) Vendor Payments (Info)

**Returns:**
- Credit Score (300-900)
- Risk Tier (Prime/Near Prime/Standard/Subprime/High Risk)
- Default Probability
- Section-wise scores
- Detailed analysis results

Get quick credit score without creating/saving application.

Useful for:
- Quick estimations
- Testing analysis
- Pre-qualification checks

Get detailed analysis result for an application.

Includes:
- All section scores
- Complete feature set
- SHAP values (if available)
- Credit score & risk tier
- Default probability

item.name: Section Analysis

request.description:
Analyze only Director/Promoter section.

Returns:
- Personal banking summary
- Behavioral signals
- Financial stability score

Analyze only Revenue & Performance section.

Returns:
- GTV metrics
- Growth rates
- Profitability analysis

Analyze only Cash Flow & Banking section.

Returns:
- Balance metrics
- Inflow/Outflow analysis (excludes P2P)
- Deposit consistency

Analyze only Compliance & Taxation section.

Returns:
- GST/ITR filing discipline
- Mismatch analysis
- Tax payment regularity
